类的使用
org.springframework.orm.jpa.EntityManagerFactoryAccessor

  • 使用EntityManagerFactoryAccessor的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.orm.jpa.support
    Classes supporting the org.springframework.orm.jpa package.
    org.springframework.orm.jpa.vendor
    Support classes for adapting to specific JPA vendors.

    • org.springframework.orm.jpa.support中EntityManagerFactoryAccessor的使用

      org.springframework.orm.jpa.support中EntityManagerFactoryAccessor的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  OpenEntityManagerInViewInterceptor
      Spring web request interceptor that binds a JPA EntityManager to the thread for the entire processing of the request.
      class  SharedEntityManagerBean
      FactoryBean that exposes a shared JPA EntityManager reference for a given EntityManagerFactory.

    • org.springframework.orm.jpa.vendor中EntityManagerFactoryAccessor的使用

      org.springframework.orm.jpa.vendor中EntityManagerFactoryAccessor的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  HibernateJpaSessionFactoryBean
      已过时。 
      as of Spring Framework 4.3.12 against Hibernate 5.2, in favor of a custom solution based on EntityManagerFactory.unwrap(java.lang.Class<T>) with explicit qualifiers and/or primary markers
